attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: You would think a professional campaign would have a better app experience.

attributes.title: Tuck Frump
attributes.review: Horrible app. Looking to see what his plans are for any of the pandemic, economy, immigration policy, etc.  What a joke of an app.  Praise this orange dude is all it’s about. The only mention of re-election  strategies are name calling and slamming Biden. Not a mention anywhere of a plan for anything.  Just  says over and over, we’re going to bring back economy and jobs..... that’s it. More mouth action only. This president is a complete moronic idiot.

attributes.title: This app smells like rotten eggs
attributes.review: I kid you not, I opened this app and it proceeded to make my whole home smell like pungent rotten eggs. I thought maybe my dog had farted, so I went outside to try again. This time when I opened the app my entire block absolutely reeked!!! My neighbors called the police because they thought I was making a chemical weapon. Luckily when the swat team arrived, they saw that I was a white woman, told me to have a wonderful day, and left. So even though this app didn’t get me arrested, I cannot recommend it.
